CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "New Champs - Herron Hill's Junior High School basketball team proved its class at the South Side Market House last Friday afternoon by winning the City Junior High School basketball championship. The new champs defeated Knoxville in finals.  Members of the team are, left to right, front row: Allen Goodman, William Evans, Lebaron Young, David Gibson, Ronald McGee and Eugene Akers.  Back row: Leroy Lowrey, Cedric Ollison, Phillip Hughes, James Winers, Coach William Ruch, James Davis, William Johnson, Kenneth Garrison and Clarence Ruckamore. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Herron Hill Junior High School basketball team, front row from left: Allen Goodman, William Evans, Lebaron Young, David Gibson, Ronald McGee, and Eugene Akers; back row: Leroy Lowrey, Cedric Ollison, Phillip Hughes, James Winers, Coach William Ruch, James Davis, William Johnson, Kenneth Garrison, and Clarence Ruckamore
